page.title: 21Hawbush Community Gardens
page.content:
Hawbush Community Gardens, Bull Street, BrierleyHill. The Former Hawbush Urban Farm, next to Hawbush PrimarySchool, had turned into a paradise for drug taking and dealing. The ground was overgrown and the building broken into and become the place for used needles and broken bottles.

Local residents have taken ownership of the site and transformed it into growing spaces for reisdents and the main building has come back to life, hosting a youthclub on Friday evenings and dance classes during the week. Many freeevents are put on throughout the year which are well received by the local youths.

The biggest issue now is to keep the funds coming in to give the local residents more options and say in what happens on site.
Gary Wright
